description:
Velouté conceives a scheme to infiltrate Sultan Vinegar’s Distillery and retrieve the Dragon Heart. Little Pigsy is a big part of this scheme. Chup and friends witness Pigsy’s covert mission via webcam. Pigsy gives it her best shot; meanwhile, the ghost of Sultan Vinegar’s dragon Smörg Åsbord causes chaos.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ブタ子大作戦! スカードン接近遭遇!!
